creator: bswen@pku.edu.cn
text:
When the Win32 solution file is ported to VC++2005 solution format, a fatal 
error RC1107 occurred from the resource compiler (rc.exe). Reason: all the 
command-line symbols defined in the form NAME="..." will make the error, as 
the quotation marks result in invalid usage.

creator: bswen@pku.edu.cn
text: The error exists since httpd-2.2.3 and later, but not in 2.2.2 and prior.

creator: gthornejr@yahoo.com
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> The error exists since httpd-2.2.3 and later, but not in 2.2.2 and prior.

I also received this error building httpd-2.2.4 with Visual Studio 2005 Pro.  I
was able to build without this error by applying the patch at

http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/apr/apr/trunk/build/cvtdsp.pl

and running it with the -2005 option.

You can follow the steps at 

http://www.apachelounge.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=6316#6316

for more information.
